data.lyric:
[ti:For The First Time]
[ar:Darius Rucker]
[al:For The First Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]For The First Time - Darius Rucker (达柳斯.拉克)
[00:09.04]Writte by：Darius Rucker/Scooter Carusoe/Derek George
[00:18.08]You say you never danced to a dashboard singin'
[00:20.79]R.E.M under summer stars
[00:23.62]
[00:24.75]Never leaned back on a jet black chevy blowing smoke rings in the dark
[00:30.32]
[00:31.29]You don't want to be a rumor girl and I feel just the same
[00:36.95]
[00:37.98]Yeah I know that you don't know me well but we can make that change
[00:44.27]When was the last time you did something for the first time
[00:50.04]
[00:50.73]Yeah let yourself go follow that feeling
[00:55.19]Maybe something new is what you're needing
[00:58.05]Like a real life let your hair down feel alive
[01:03.94]
[01:04.48]When was the last time you did something for the first time
[01:10.23]
[01:14.84]Say you never drank from the bottle of some
[01:17.50]Two dollar wine run barefoot through the mud
[01:21.11]
[01:22.21]Never had the right kiss stolen from your
[01:25.12]Lips while you watched the sun come up
[01:27.65]
[01:28.62]Well I know your friends are watching and they probably disapprove
[01:34.49]
[01:35.77]But give me just half a chance girl I'm daring you
[01:41.25]
[01:41.84]When was the last time you did something for the first time
[01:47.86]Yeah let yourself go follow that feeling
[01:52.15]
[01:52.74]Maybe something new is what you're needing
[01:55.90]Like a real life let your hair down feel alive
[02:01.97]When was the last time you did something for the first time
[02:08.49]
[02:19.34]Now the way you're looking says you're living
[02:23.09]I hope I ain't reading wrong
[02:25.24]
[02:26.03]Cause the way you're shining I think you're thinking
[02:29.46]
[02:30.25]It's been way too long
[02:32.44]When was the last time you did something for the first time
[02:38.67]Yeah yeah let yourself go come on follow that feeling
[02:43.36]Maybe something new is what you're needing
[02:46.56]Like a real life let your hair down feel alive alive
[02:52.74]When was the last time oh you did something for the first time girl
[02:59.61]
[03:00.79]Come on baby
[03:01.49]
[03:02.81]When was the last time yeah you did something for the first time
data.trans:
[ti:For The First Time]
[ar:Darius Rucker]
[al:For The First Time]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:09.04]//
[00:18.08]你说你永不会随着平庸之作起舞
[00:20.79]传统乐队才是真正的夏日明星
[00:23.62]
[00:24.75]从未驾驶一辆深黑色的雪佛兰呼啸着冲进黑夜
[00:30.32]
[00:31.29]你不想成为一个绯闻女孩 我与你有相同的看法
[00:36.95]
[00:37.98]是的 我知道你对我还不甚了解 但是我们可以做出些改变
[00:44.27]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[00:50.04]
[00:50.73]是的 去追随那个感觉
[00:55.19]或许你需要一些新的刺激
[00:58.05]感受真实的生活 放下你的头发 自由活泼
[01:03.94]
[01:04.48]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[01:10.23]
[01:14.84]说你从未彻底喝醉过
[01:17.50]两美元的酒就会让你彻底嗨翻
[01:21.11]
[01:22.21]当你看着太阳升起的时候
[01:25.12]从未从你唇上偷走过一枚香吻
[01:27.65]
[01:28.62]好吧 我知道你的朋友都在围观 他们或许并不赞成
[01:34.49]
[01:35.77]但是稍微给我点机会 我会珍惜你的
[01:41.25]
[01:41.84]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[01:47.86]是的 去追随那个感觉
[01:52.15]
[01:52.74]或许你需要一些新的刺激
[01:55.90]感受真实的生活 放下你的头发 自由活泼
[02:01.97]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[02:08.49]
[02:19.34]现在你的样子就证明你在享受生活
[02:23.09]我希望我没有看错
[02:25.24]
[02:26.03]因为你如此闪耀 我想你正在思考
[02:29.46]
[02:30.25]这条路太过漫长
[02:32.44]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[02:38.67]释放自己 追随那个感觉
[02:43.36]或许你需要一些新的刺激
[02:46.56]感受真实的生活 放下你的头发 自由活泼
[02:52.74]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
[02:59.61]
[03:00.79]加油 宝贝
[03:01.49]
[03:02.81]在最后的时刻 也像第一次那样全力以赴
